Plot: My name's Arthur, a huge Internet star who's just hit 3 million subs. What was supposed to be a perfect hangover, has turned into an epic fight for survival.

Title: Last Sentinel

While their tour of duty ended three months ago, the relief crew still hasn't arrived and as the empty weeks turn to months, paranoia descends, testing relationships to breaking point...

Title: Johnny & Clyde

Plot: Johnny and Clyde are two serial killers who are madly in love and on an endless crime spree. Unfortunately for Johnny and Clyde's crew, Alana has a deadly weapon at her disposal – the monstrous slasher spirit known as Bakwas.
